metadata.title: CVE-2020-22032 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability exists FFmpeg 4.2 atlibavfilter/vf_edgedetect.c in gaussian_blur, which might lead to memorycorruption and other potential consequences.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
